description: Specimen roles associated with a given order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Lists the roles associated with a given specimen


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Blind Sample


Used for Calibration


Electronic QC


Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing


Group


Pool


Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiency


Control Specimen


Replicate of patient sample as a control


Used for Periodic Calibration Checks
